Rep. Mike Pence ( R-IN) said he was nearing a decision on his political future, the Indianapolis Star reports. A run for Indiana governor is also a possibility. Said Mike Pence : We've been trying to listen first to Hoosiers and then to other voices around the country about where they think we might best serve in the years ahead. Going forward, we remain committed to aggressive investment in both our people and our products as we pursue an innovation agenda. Announcing financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2010. Google reported revenues of$ 7.29 billion for the quarter ended September 30, 2010, an increase of 23% compared to the third quarter of 2009
